item.description: A transparent, odorless liquid that feels strangely lighter than water.

item.description: This potion smells like burnt sugar.

item.description: A very soft orange cupcake, laced with Mopox cure potion.

item.name: Slow Poison Potion
item.description: A Sarı potion with a fresh, citric scent.
